text: The Most Eminent Order of Islam Brunei (), also translated as The Most Illustrious Islamic Religious Order of the State of Brunei, is an order of Brunei. It was established on 1 August 1968 by Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah for service in the propagation, preservation and strengthening of the Islamic religion. The order consists of five classes: {| class="wikitable" !Class !Post-nominal !Title |- |First Class |PSSUB |Dato Paduka Seri Setia |- |Second Class |DSSUB |Dato Seri Setia |- |Third Class |SSUB | - |- |Fourth Class |SUB | - |- |Fifth Class |PUB | - |} == References == Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Brunei Category:Awards established in 1968 Category:1968 establishments in Brunei
title: Order of Islam Brunei
